title: Black Iron Magician - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Accelerated Growth   Adapted to Manga   Cautious Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Demon Lord   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Elves   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Master-Disciple Relationship   Multiple Protagonists   Revenge   Succubus   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Teamwork   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Mayoi Doufu   迷井豆腐
description:
It has been more than ten years since he was transported to another world. The protagonist Deris Fahrenheit, who has became a magician with special circumstances, was freely enjoying his life in this world. However, a girl appeared before him and asked him to make her his disciple. That girl seems to be a transported person――

It’s a story of him who becomes the girl’s teacher and trains her to achieve her revenge (?) in otherworld.
>
